ing: 1 (16 ounce) can red salmon, drained and flaked
1 Red Delicious apple, cored and minced
des: "Sweetened with apples and raisins and eaten on whole wheat saltines, this is a very healthy lunch salad! I like my salads moist, so you may want to adjust your lemon juice or mayo."
ins:
Combine red salmon and lemon juice in a glass bowl; mix well.
Stir in golden raisins, apple, celery, mayonnaise, and crushed red pepper flakes; mix thoroughly.
